markdownRemark.html: Located in El Ejido, Almeria Province, this club has been established since 1984. The facilities includes - Two pools, five tennis courts, three padel courts, a multisport track, a classroom with air conditioning, green areas and gardens, shaded areas and tents, restaurant-dining room, changing rooms and toilets, a gym and a sauna. All the equipment is new and of great quality.

frontmatter.title: Club de Tenis El Ejido

tags: Top Things to do with kids in Almeria
